title: Lack of Header option on the toolbar
body:
Not sure if this is normal or this is just a momentary slip-up but the lack of header option kinda made me curious. Is this jsut a temporary thing or will it be implemented soon?

#Like I had no idea this is a thing.

##or this

####or this.

#####or this even

######now I think I'm whispering.ssssh

replies.body:
I wouldn't mind it being a toolbar thing, but we also used to have a little formatting guide link whenever you started to create a post and it wasn't mentioned there either....found it out via another guy. -shrug-

If anyone is wondering how he's doing that use a # at the beginning of a line, add more ### to make the header smaller.

Oh hey, cap, u may also want to know using --- at the beginning of a line makes a nice horizontal divider like so: 

---
is nice for long posts, you know, like the awesome champ concepts you've been putting up :)
We moved the Formatting Guide link to the toolbar but forgot to push the updated toolbar out to the NA site until now. Whoops!

Mystery solved! Love the addition, thank you!

Although if I may to suggest also including the ##headers and "---" lines? Not many people know how to do that and it's invaluable for formatting.
http://stackoverflow.com/editing-help - this might help though there's lot of extra features this community does not implement. I've posted this before...
This guy tells the truth. And yeah, a generic "How to" would also be a good idea. Though I'll gladly take an incomplete toolbar over a complete guide page.

yeah, there've been a few user made posts trying to get the word out but they can never gain traction because there's really just the headers and lines not on the toolbar at this point. I don't have any other formatting tricks up my sleeve, and I've been with CB from the start, lol :)

Also 

-\--

for

---

and putting **!** in front of the link will make it an image.
